all_text_timv: Britten, Benjamin, 1913-1976. Opera arias / Benjamin Britten ; compiled by Dan Dressen. Baritone. [United States?] : Boosey & Hawkes, [1999] ©1999 1 vocal score (38 pages) ; 31 cm notated music ntm rdacontent unmediated n rdamedia volume nc rdacarrier Acc. arranged for piano. Introduction and foreword in English and German. Virtue, says Holy Writ ; Tickling a trout ; Churchyard's agog with a crowd of folks : from Albert Herring -- Caution is better, sweet highness : from Gloriana -- Within this frail crucible of light : from The rape of Lucretia -- Jemmy legs likes me ; Look! through the port comes the moonshine astray! ; I had to strike down that Jemmy legs : from Billy Budd. UP-PAT copy: Purchased with funds from the Class of 1935 Libraries Endowment; 20089. PSt. Words in English and German. Operas Excerpts Vocal scores with piano. Songs (Medium voice) with piano. Britten, Benjamin, 1913-1976. Operas. Vocal scores. Selections. German. Britten, Benjamin, 1913-1976. Operas. Vocal scores. Selections. English. Dressen, Dan.
